info.title: Cat Activities Monitor API
info.description: A comprehensive FastAPI-based system for monitoring cats using YOLO object detection and activity analysis.

get.description: Returns basic information about the Cat Activities Monitor API including version and available endpoints.

example.description: AI-powered cat monitoring system with YOLO object detection and activity analysis

get.description: Get comprehensive system status including configuration, services, and runtime information.
Simple health check endpoint to verify the API is responding.
Retrieve the current system configuration including camera sources, YOLO settings, and detection parameters.

post.description: Reload the system configuration from the config file.

get.description: Retrieve recent log entries from the application log file.
Get a list of all configured camera/image sources with their settings and status.

post.description: Fetch and analyze a specific camera image by name. This will download the image, run YOLO detection, and return the results.

200.description: Camera image fetched and analyzed successfully

404.description: Camera source not found or no configuration loaded

500.description: Failed to fetch or analyze camera image

post.description: Fetch and analyze images from all enabled camera sources concurrently.

get.description: Get detection database status and statistics including recent activity and detection counts.

post.description: Clean up old detection results from database, keeping only recent records.

get.description: Get list of detection images with metadata and annotation information.

200.description: List of detection images with metadata

get.description: Get detailed annotations and detection data for a specific detection image.
Get current detection status across all camera sources.

200.description: Current detection status for all sources

get.description: Get list of all available YOLO detection classes that can be detected.

post.description: Reprocess a detection image with current ML model and update database with new results.
Reprocess all detection images with current ML model and update database with new results.

get.description: Get a list of all available activity types that can be detected and tracked.

activities.name: Playing
activities.description: Cat is playing or being active

get.description: Get a summary of recent activity across all cameras and cats.
Get activity history for a specific camera with optional date filtering.

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of records to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return

get.description: List all submitted feedback for review.

post.description: Submit feedback for a detection image to improve the model.

get.description: Get detailed feedback information.
Get training status and available models.

post.description: Export feedback data in YOLO format that preserves COCO classes and adds metadata.
Model retraining that preserves COCO classes and adds cat identification capabilities through fine-tuning.
Switch the current ML model to the specified model filename.

get.description: List all cat profiles.
Get detailed information about a specific cat.
Get activity history for a specific named cat.

width.title: Width
width.description: Width of the bounding box in pixels

height.title: Height
height.description: Height of the bounding box in pixels

BoundingBox.title: BoundingBox
BoundingBox.description:
Standardized bounding box model for feedback.

Represents rectangular coordinates in pixel space with additional
width and height for convenience.

CatActivity.title: CatActivity
CatActivity.description:
Enumeration of detectable cat activities.

These activities are recognized through pose analysis and behavioral patterns.

name.title: Name
name.description: Unique name identifier for the cat

description.title: Description
description.description: General description or notes about the cat
description.example: A friendly orange tabby who loves to play with string toys

color.title: Color
color.description: Primary color or color pattern of the cat

favorite_activities.title: Favorite Activities
favorite_activities.description: List of activities this cat is commonly observed doing

created_timestamp.title: Created Timestamp
created_timestamp.description: When this cat profile was first created

last_seen_timestamp.title: Last Seen Timestamp
last_seen_timestamp.description: When this cat was last detected in any camera

total_detections.title: Total Detections
total_detections.description: Total number of times this cat has been detected

average_confidence.title: Average Confidence
average_confidence.description: Average detection confidence score for this cat

preferred_locations.title: Preferred Locations
preferred_locations.description: Camera/image sources where this cat is commonly seen

CatProfile.title: CatProfile
CatProfile.description:
Profile for a named cat with their characteristics.

Contains identification information, physical characteristics,
behavioral patterns, and detection statistics for individual cats.

class_id.title: Class Id
class_id.description: YOLO class ID for the detected object

class_name.title: Class Name
class_name.description: Human-readable name of the detected class

Detection.title: Detection
Detection.description:
Represents a single object detection result from ML model.

Contains the detected object's class information, confidence score,
and bounding box coordinates.

class_id.title: Class Id
class_id.description: YOLO class ID for the annotated object

class_name.title: Class Name
class_name.description: Human-readable name of the annotated class

bounding_box.description: Corrected or confirmed bounding box coordinates

confidence.title: Confidence
confidence.description: User-provided confidence rating for this annotation

cat_name.title: Cat Name
cat_name.description: Optional name for the identified cat

activity_feedback.title: Activity Feedback
activity_feedback.description: User's textual feedback about the cat's activity
activity_feedback.example: The cat appears to be playing with a toy mouse

correct_activity.description: User's correction of the detected activity

activity_confidence.title: Activity Confidence
activity_confidence.description: User's confidence in their activity assessment

FeedbackAnnotation.title: FeedbackAnnotation
FeedbackAnnotation.description:
User-provided annotation for training data.

Contains corrections, additions, or confirmations of detection results
along with optional cat identification and activity feedback.

image_filename.title: Image Filename
image_filename.description: Name of the image file being annotated

image_path.title: Image Path
image_path.description: Full path to the image file

original_detections.title: Original Detections
original_detections.description: Original detection results from the ML model

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Additional notes or comments from the user
notes.example: The second cat was missed by the detector - it's partially hidden behind the first cat

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: Identifier for the user providing feedback

ImageFeedback.title: ImageFeedback
ImageFeedback.description:
Feedback data for a single detection image.

Contains the original detection results along with user corrections,
additions, and annotations for model improvement.

custom_model_name.title: Custom Model Name
custom_model_name.description: Custom name for the retrained model

description.title: Description
description.description: Optional description of the retraining process
description.example: Retrained with 500 new annotations focusing on sleeping cats

ModelRetrainRequest.title: ModelRetrainRequest
ModelRetrainRequest.description:
Request model for retraining with custom model name.

Used to initiate model retraining with feedback data and specify
a custom name for the resulting model.

tags.name: main
tags.description: Main application endpoints including root interface and API information.

tags.name: system
tags.description: System administration endpoints for status, configuration, health checks, and logs.

tags.name: cameras
tags.description: Camera and image source management endpoints for listing cameras and fetching images.

tags.name: detections
tags.description: Detection results and analysis endpoints for retrieving detection data and images.

tags.name: activities
tags.description: Activity analysis endpoints for tracking and summarizing cat activities across cameras.

tags.name: feedback
tags.description: Feedback system endpoints for submitting corrections and improvements to enhance model accuracy.

tags.name: training
tags.description: Model training and management endpoints for custom model creation and switching between models.

tags.name: cats
tags.description: Cat profile management endpoints for creating, updating, and tracking individual cats.
